post_text: The Resilient Solano Summit was a huge success! Over 200 community members joined the summit, starting the morning with an inspirational talk from author Liz Huntly. The day also included the remarkable film Resilience, which illustrates the strong connection between childhood traumas of varying degrees with physical and mental health in adults. The summit also offered twelve workshops focused on ways that adults throughout our community can support students in developing resilience. The Summit was brought to the community by Solano Kids Thrive with funding support from the Solano County Office of Education, Solano County, Solano Public Health, First 5 Solano, and Quality Counts. Together we can make a positive difference that can last for generations! #BeAGameChanger
